name: Happy Happy Demons
description:
Little girl --> run over by truck after stabbing puppy --> starts falling to hell --> demon trying to escape hell catches you in limbo --> both gotta work together and preserve your link to get back to earth!

Usually just do programming, but thought this time around i would try and draw everything, yeh that turned out exactly how you would think.

Everything but the music was made by me within the jam! :)
